## Problem Statement

A clear description of the problem you're trying to solve.

Example: "I need to deploy to multiple environments (staging/production)..."

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution you'd like.

## Alternative Solutions

Any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.

## Use Case

Describe your use case and how this feature would help.

## Additional Context

- Screenshots, diagrams, or mockups
- Links to similar features in other tools
- Any other relevant information

## Implementation Ideas (Optional)

If you have technical suggestions:

- Which files would need changes?
- Any AWS services involved?
- Breaking changes?

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues/features
- [ ] This feature would benefit other users
- [ ] I'm willing to help implement this (optional)
